title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 64-1.0 - Preamble
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 64-1.0 - Preamble

State Regulations

Pursuant to the provisions of section
25.13
of the Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law, policies of insurance providing liability insurance coverage to owners or operators of snowmobiles operating on the roadway or shoulder of a public street or highway in the State of New York must be in such language and form as shall be determined and established by the Superintendent of Insurance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
64-1.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
